page.title: 04UNACCEPTABLE FEATURES.
page.content: I think that the most noticeable feature in our area is the railway lines, there are trains running every ten or fifteen minutes, you can hear trains sometimes in the night. In the summer there are trains that go along the lines with great big lights on the front, and they make a noise like thunder. On our bit of grass at the back there is always dog dirt. On the front I watch cats digging holes and then they do their dirt. If you walk on the grass you would have dog dirt on your shoes. Since we've been living here, that's about two years now, we've had about ten dead mice on our garden .... next door's cat keeps bringing them. They have a dog but keep it in; many people do not care and let them roam. Now there is a van that comes round and collects any stray dogs.
